skins.shipDescription: Brooklyn-class light cruiser ¨C Phoenix, Hull Number CL-46!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Phoenix. I once escorted a certain important person. Just like a phoenix, no matter what happens to me, I'll always come back from death! Throw all the dangerous missions you've got at me, I won't let you down!
skins.acquisition: Are you the commander? I'm Phoenix. That's right, the legendary phoenix! Do you have what it takes to lead me?
skins.login: Hey, Commander! I'll protect you, like I always do!
skins.details: What's the matter, Commander? You look kinda emotionless.
skins.secretaryIdle1: My motto is: "be the best at everything"!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Is the sun bigger in Argentina?
skins.secretaryIdle3: There's nothing more thrilling than coming back from the verge of death!
skins.secretaryTouch: It's here, it's here! Want to head out now?
